errors.error_description: Specified outdated Python 2.7+ and Django 1.8+ version requirements that are no longer supported or realistic for current development
correction_candidates: Update to current supported versions like Python 3.8+ and Django 3.2+
Remove specific version requirements and refer to the official compatibility documentation
Specify Python 3.9+ and Django 4.0+ as minimum requirements
Use version ranges like Python 3.7-3.11 and Django 2.2-4.2
errors.golden_answer: Remove specific version requirements and refer to the official compatibility documentation
